column2:
If set to 'Test' the module will use the Hipay test system otherwise it's using the live system.
Note, you need separate accounts for each system. See 'How to setup Hipay' for more information.
Select the minimum age of the buyers.

ID number of the Hipay account on which this store website is declared.
Normally this is your main account. Do not use your member area id here!

Merchant password of the Hipay account on which this store website is declared (it's not the login password!).
To set a new merchant password: Log in to your Hipay account, navigate to Payment buttons where you can find a list of your registered sites. Click on the site informations button of the related site. Enter your merchant password and click on confirm. Do not forget to enter your new password here too.

What you have to do here:
  • Set your account data (account id, password and site id).
  • Select order category and age classification.
  • Set an e-mail address for payment notifications.
For more informations please go to the How to setup Hipay tab above.

What you can do here:
  • Change the account mode to 'test' and run this extension in test mode.
  • Set your own logo for the payment dialog.
  • Set different accounts to split the amounts of your payments.

    You can automatically split the payment amount into one ore more of the following partial amounts: product and shipping.
    As a result of this, you have do create different sub accounts for each of the partial amounts under your Hipay account.

What you can do here:
  • Enable this payment method
  • Select the countries where this payment method should be available

To use this extension you must create a user area on hipay.com and store certain information about your shop.
Afterwards open the tab Hipay Account and enter the necessary account data. The extension is now fully configured.
Enable the extension and Hipay as a new payment method on the tab General Extension Settings.
Well done.
Create your user account on hipay.com.

Where you can find help:

If you have questions about our extension, suggestions for improvement or you think you have found a bug, please write an email to support.wallet@hipay.com.

For any other question, e.g. if you have an issue with one of your payment transactions, please use our contact form on hipay.com

ID of the (sub) account which the amount paid for the goods will be credited.
If this field is left blank, then the Hipay merchant account is used.

If a logo URL was entered, the logo is displayed in the payment dialog.
This logo, in GIF, PNG or JPG (JPEG) format must be accessible from the Internet via HTTPS protocol. This logo must not exceed 100x100 pixels in size.

Id of the selected site.
To get a site id register your store website on the selected Hipay account. You can find this option in your Hipay account under the menu item Payment buttons.
E-Mail used by Hipay to post operation notifications.

Select the order category.
A list of your categories (based on the selected business lineand category for your site on Hipay).
1. Enter your Site Id
2. Click on Save Config
3. The Order Category list will be updated.
4. Choose a pleasant category and click on Save Config again.
